title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, July 19, 2020
description: On this date in 1848, the first Convention for Women's Rights opened in Seneca Falls, New York. Speakers included Lucretia Mott and Frederick Douglass.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date in 1848, the first Convention for Women's Rights opened in Seneca Falls, New York. Speakers included Lucretia Mott and Frederick Douglass.
